message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,100,000.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to pay a bit less. Given the value of this product, I'm willing to pay $1,000,000. What do you think?

I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob, but I'm afraid I need to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $1,050,000. This is my final compromise, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
